question: Which country recently announced that it would host the Asian Boxing Championships for men and women in November-December 2020?
explanation:
The Boxing Federation of India has recently announced that it would host the Asian Boxing Championships for men and women in November-December this year.
Prior to this edition, India had last hosted the men’s Asian Boxing meet in 1980 and the women’s championships in 2003, before the event became a combined Championships for both gender in 2019. Last year, the Asian Boxing Championship 2019 was held in Huamark Indoor Stadium in Bangkok, Thailand.
